catalogue_raissonne: Parr & Badger pp. 212-13; Kaneko & Vartanian pp. 86-93; Heiting & Kaneko 282
description: slipcase wrapped in black-and-white marbleized-looking paper, containing a black hardcover book and black paper pamphlet; Japanese characters are embossed across the top of the book, as well as artist and title of book; book contains black-and-white images of various rock formations and military portraits; lender's archive # 219
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pen by the artist on last page of book
title: The Map (Chizu)
